amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds may be used for any account of the Department of Defense in excess of the amount made available for such amount for fiscal year 2008, unless financial statements of the Department for fiscal year 2013 are validated as ready for audit within 180 days after the date of enactment. The reduction shall not apply to the following accounts: 1) Military, reserve, and National Guard personnel accounts and 2) The Defense Health Program account.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Lee (CA) amendment (A032). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation. The Chair sustained the point of order.
